text: Patti Davis (born October 21, 1952) is an American actress, model and author. David was born at Cedar-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, She is youngest daughter of late U.S. President Ronald Reagan and Reagan's second wife, Nancy Reagan. She is have one brother Ron Reagan Davis In 2013, she published a book called Till Human Voices Wake Us. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Reagan family Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Patti Davis
